author: spencer_tb
content:
We have the `blockchain_test_engine` format in our releases, that we use for within the `eest/consume-engine` simulator against a fully instantiated client: https://hive.ethpandaops.io/#/group/fusaka-devnet-0

I'd be in favour of clients creating a runner for these tests (like they do for the  `blockchain_test` format) in the future! The format is defined here: https://eest.ethereum.org/main/consuming_tests/blockchain_test_engine/

I wont push hard for it though as we get more coverage with the hive simulator

author: spencer_tb
content: We are not currently running this type of test in hive but we can and should. Planning to get the default `engine` simulator back up to speed to for Fusaka
